name: Custom
description:
All cephalopods are knit from fingering weight 100% Peruvian highland wool on size 0 double pointed knitting needles. Each cephalopod takes between 15 and 20 hours to complete.

Vegan/organic options are available at no extra cost! For more information about all custom order options see the 'about' link on the sidebar, or feel free to contact me.

Once you make your purchase, please be sure to tell me if you would like a squid or octopus, and which color you would like it to be. Color options can be found here*

* Some yarn colors will need to be ordered and will thus take longer to create. If you would like to know which colors I have at hand, ask!
